content: this is a mosaic knitting chart for a pro-minneapolis sign wall hanging or motif reading mpls strong there are no instructions just a chart any yarn will work with an appropriately sized needle for the yarn weight but i recommend worsted or bulky with a size 7-9 needle there are two versions available on the chart the second version has a slightly different border around the word strong which makes it more readable i d love to see anything that you make with this i m a long-time and very proud south minneapolis resident and i am hoping for a better future for us
